name: mud-shot
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 100% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user attacks by hurling a blob of mud at the target. This also lowers the target’s Speed stat.
